entities.name: Mr. Weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a character in the story who got drawn into a disagreement about cobbing with Charlie.

entities.name: Charlie
entities.description: Charlie is a person who got involved in a disagreement about cobbing with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: Ginny
entities.description: Ginny fell asleep and spilled hot chocolate all over the floor.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione went into the next tent with Ginny.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry was on a top bunk above Ron and lay staring up at the canvas ceiling of the tent.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who was sleeping below him in the same tent.

entities.name: Krum
entities.description: Krum is a person whose more spectacular moves are being remembered by Harry.

entities.name: Irish
entities.description: The Irish are the people who are celebrating and making noise on the other side of the campsite.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley got drawn into a disagreement about cobbing with Charlie.
Hermione went into the next tent with Ginny.
Harry was remembering Krum's more spectacular moves.
